title: Storm of Argument (3C6)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Shuffle up to X [Dwarven] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
Lore:	”'I will be dead before I see the Ring in the hands of an Elf!'”
Rarity:	C
